name: data
description: Databricks notebooks and Python packages for OpenJII

scripts.check-python: command -v python3 >/dev/null 2>&1 || (echo 'Python3 not found, skipping Python operations' && exit 1)
scripts.check-poetry: python3 -m poetry --version >/dev/null 2>&1 || (echo 'Poetry not found, installing...' && pip3 install poetry)
scripts.install: pnpm run check-python && pnpm run check-poetry && python3 -m poetry install
scripts.build: pnpm run check-python && pnpm run build:multispeq && pnpm run build:ambyte && pnpm run build:enrich && pnpm run build:openjii
scripts.test: pnpm run check-python && python3 -m poetry run pytest --cov=src/lib --cov-report=json --cov-report=lcov --cov-report=term
scripts.test:watch: pnpm run check-python && python3 -m poetry run pytest --cov=src/lib -f
scripts.clean: git clean -xdf .cache .turbo .pytest_cache coverage/ dist/ *.egg-info/ && pnpm run clean:multispeq && pnpm run clean:ambyte && pnpm run clean:enrich && pnpm run clean:openjii
scripts.clean:multispeq: cd src/lib/multispeq && git clean -xdf dist/ build/ *.egg-info/
scripts.clean:ambyte: cd src/lib/ambyte && git clean -xdf dist/ build/ *.egg-info/
scripts.clean:enrich: cd src/lib/enrich && git clean -xdf dist/ build/ *.egg-info/
scripts.clean:openjii: cd src/lib/openjii && git clean -xdf dist/ build/ *.egg-info/
